Reduces efficiency of Priority increase effects of the enemy by 30%
+50 Action Points at battle start
transcend.6:

Increases Speed of the caster for 1 turn at battle start

SKT_FIRST.name: Twin Mega Cannon
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy, and has a <color=#28d9ed>20%</color> chance to increase the Ultimate Skill cooldowns of the target by <color=#28d9ed>1 turn</color>.\nIncreases damage dealt to bosses.

SKT_BURST_1.effect: Increases damage\nInflicts Reduced Defense on the target for 2 turns
SKT_BURST_1.effect_jp: ダメージUP\n対象の防御力-2ターン

SKT_BURST_2.effect_jp: ダメージUP\nスキルターン増加確率+60%

SKT_BURST_3.effect: Changes to Enhanced Skill\nTargets all enemies and increases damage dealt
SKT_BURST_3.effect_kr: 강화 스킬로 교체\n공격 범위 확대 및 피해 증가
SKT_BURST_3.effect_jp: 強化スキルに変更\n攻撃範囲拡大およびダメージUP

description: Attacks an enemy, and has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000075_1_1]</color> chance to increase the Ultimate Skill cooldowns of the target by <color=#28d9ed>1 turn</color>.\nIncreases damage dealt to bosses.
SKT_FIRST.name_jp: ツイン・メガキャノン
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격하고 <color=#28d9ed>20%</color> 확률로 대상의 필살기 쿨타임을 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 증가시킵니다.\n보스에게 입히는 피해가 증가합니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、<color=#28d9ed>20%</color>の確率で対象の必殺スキルのスキルターンを<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>増加させる。\nボスに与えるダメージがUPする。

SKT_SECOND.name: Crush Gear
SKT_SECOND.true_desc:
(Passive Effect)
When the caster removes buffs from an enemy, grants the caster <color=#28d9ed>Destroyer's Punishment</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
(Triggered Effect) When the caster uses an attack that targets all enemies, uses <color=#ffd732>Heavy Metal Raptor</color>. (Excluding Skill Chains)

<color=#ffd732>Heavy Metal Raptor</color>: Attacks all enemies. Increases damage dealt to bosses.
description:
(Passive Effect)
When the caster removes buffs from an enemy, grants the caster <color=#28d9ed>Destroyer's Punishment</color> for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000075_2_1] turn(s)</color>.
(Triggered Effect) When the caster uses an attack that targets all enemies, uses <color=#ffd732>Heavy Metal Raptor</color>. (Excluding Skill Chains)

<color=#ffd732>Heavy Metal Raptor</color>: Attacks all enemies. Increases damage dealt to bosses.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr:
(패시브 효과)
자신이 적의 강화 효과를 해제시키면 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>파괴자의 응징</color>을 획득합니다.
(발동 효과) 자신이 전체 공격 시 <color=#ffd732>헤비메탈 랩터</color>를 사용합니다. (스킬 체인 제외)

<color=#ffd732>헤비메탈 랩터</color> : 적 전체를 공격합니다. 보스에게 입히는 피해가 증가합니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp:
(パッシブ効果)
自分が敵の強化効果を解除した場合、自分に<color=#28d9ed>【破壊者の戒め】</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。
(発動効果)自分が全体攻撃を使用時、<color=#ffd732>【ヘヴィメタルラプター】</color>を発動する。(チェーンスキルでは発動しない)

<color=#ffd732>【ヘヴィメタルラプター】</color>:敵全体にダメージを与える。ボスに与えるダメージがUPする。

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Destruction Blade
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Has a <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> chance to remove <color=#28d9ed>all</color> <color=#28d9ed>buffs</color> from all enemies, and attacks all enemies.\nAfter attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Unhealable</color> on all enemies for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\nIncreases damage dealt to bosses.
description: Has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000075_3_1]</color> chance to remove <color=#28d9ed>all</color> <color=#28d9ed>buffs</color> from all enemies, and attacks all enemies.\nAfter attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000075_3_2]</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Unhealable</color> on all enemies for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000075_3_2] turn(s)</color>.\nIncreases damage dealt to bosses.
SKT_ULTIMATE.name_jp: デストラクションブレード
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> 확률로 적 전체의 <color=#28d9ed>강화 효과</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>모두</color> 해제하고 적 전체를 공격합니다.\n공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>70%</color>의 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 적 전체에게 <color=#28d9ed>회복 불가</color>를 부여합니다.\n보스에게 입히는 피해가 증가합니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: <color=#28d9ed>70%</color>の確率で敵全体の<color=#28d9ed>強化効果</color>を<color=#28d9ed>すべて</color>解除し、 敵全体にダメージを与える。\n攻撃後、敵全体に<color=#28d9ed>70%</color>の確率で<color=#28d9ed>回復不可</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。\nボスに与えるダメージがUPする。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: Always has elemental advantage.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: Has a <color=#28d9ed>40%</color> chance to increase the Ultimate Skill cooldowns of the target by <color=#28d9ed>1 turn</color>.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: Always has elemental advantage.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: Has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000075_backup_1_1]</color> chance to increase the Ultimate Skill cooldowns of the target by <color=#28d9ed>1 turn</color>.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
3_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
4_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
5_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 컴패니언 효과</color> : 항상 유리한 상성으로 적용됩니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : <color=#28d9ed>40%</color> 확률로 대상의 필살기 쿨타임을 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 증가시킵니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(汎用)</color>:有利属性の攻撃判定でダメージを与える。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:<color=#28d9ed>40%</color>の確率で、対象の必殺スキルのスキルターンを<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>増加させる。

Fullname_jp: デミウルゴス ヴラダ
